## expFactor variable

Computes exponential factor to interpolate from `a` to `b` over `num` steps. I.e. multiplying `a` with the returned factor will yield `b` after `num` steps. All args must be &gt; 0.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
expFactor: (a: number, b: number, num: number) => number
```
